OrgName.entry: SOUTH YORKSHIRE AND HALLAMSHIRE CLUBS FOR YOUNG PEOPLE

Desc.entry: A registered charity that promotes youth development through sporting, social and creative activities. Trains young people and adults working with young people. Supports affiliated clubs through administrative work and organises activities and events for them to participate in. Assists with fundraising and club activities. Advice available through legal and financial supporters. Equipment available on free loan to affiliated clubs. Events include a fundraising boxing/dinner show.

ContactName.entry: Mark Brine, County Director/Walleed Al-amrie, Sports and Activity Development Manager

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
